subject: Account Verification Required
body: Dear user, your account has been flagged for unusual activity. Please click the link below to verify your account and avoid suspension. http://fakebank-login.com

subject: Meeting Schedule Update
body: Hi team, our weekly meeting has been moved to 3 PM tomorrow in Conference Room B.

subject: Urgent Password Reset
body: We detected suspicious login attempts. Reset your password immediately using the link below. http://security-update.com

subject: Lunch Invitation
body: Hey, want to grab lunch tomorrow at the new cafe downtown?

subject: Invoice Payment Reminder
body: Your invoice #2345 is overdue. Please pay now to avoid late fees. http://billing-secure-payments.com

subject: Project Kickoff
body: Excited to announce the kickoff for Project Aurora. Please join the kickoff call at 10 AM.
